Employment Advisor measures

Source: vignettes/metadata-monthly-ea.Rmd
metadata-monthly-ea.Rmd

Note: This package currently only provides metadata for the most recent monthly reporting period.

In total there are 110 monthly EA measures:

ID Description
EA001 Calculate proportion of referrals submitted in the month with an employment support contact that do not have employment status record within the referral start and end dates (or reporting period end date if referral end date not set).
EA002 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have valid EmployStatus
EA003 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have default EmployStatus
EA004 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have invalid EmployStatus
EA005 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have missing EmployStatus
EA006 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have valid WeekHoursWorked
EA007 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have default WeekHoursWorked
EA008 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have invalid WeekHoursWorked
EA009 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have missing WeekHoursWorked
EA010 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have valid BenefitRecInd
EA011 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have default BenefitRecInd
EA012 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have invalid BenefitRecInd
EA013 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have missing BenefitRecInd
EA018 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have valid ESAInd
EA019 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have default ESAInd
EA020 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have invalid ESAInd
EA021 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have missing ESAInd
EA022 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have valid UCInd
EA023 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have default UCInd
EA024 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have invalid UCInd
EA025 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have missing UCInd
EA026 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have valid PIPInd
EA027 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have default PIPInd
EA028 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have invalid PIPInd
EA029 Counts the EmpStatus records submitted in the month that have missing PIPInd
EA034 Number of referrals submitted in the month that have received an employment support appointment in the pathway or as a follow up
EA035 Number of referrals submitted in the month that have not received an employment support appointment in the pathway or as a follow up
EA036 Number of referrals with at least 1 attended appointment or internet enabled therapy in the month
EA037 Number of referrals with at least 1 attended appointment or internet enabled therapy in the month but no appointments were Employment Support
EA038 Number of Referrals that only received Employment support in the month
EA039 Number of referrals that received both Employment Support and NHS Talking Therapies in the month
EA040 Number of referrals that had their first Employment Support appointment in the month
EA041 Number of referrals that had their last Employment Support appointment in the month.
M296 Number of referrals finishing in the month that received NHS Talking Therapies only before the referral end date
M297 Number of referrals finishing in the month that received NHS Talking Therapies only before the referral end date and started not at caseness
M298 Number of referrals finishing in the month that received NHS Talking Therapies only before the referral end date and showed reliable improvement
M299 Reliable improvement rate for referrals finishing in the month that received NHS Talking Therapies only before the referral end date
M300 Number of referrals finishing in the month that received NHS Talking Therapies only before the referral end date and showed no reliable change
M301 Number of referrals finishing in the month that received NHS Talking Therapies only before the referral end date and showed reliable deterioration
M302 Number of referrals finishing in the month that received NHS Talking Therapies only before the referral end date and moved to recovery
M303 Recovery rate for referrals finishing in the month that received NHS Talking Therapies only before the referral end date
M304 Number of referrals finishing in the month that received NHS Talking Therapies only before the referral end date and showed reliable recovery
M305 Reliable recovery rate for referrals finishing in the month that received NHS Talking Therapies only before the referral end date
M306 Number of referrals finishing in the month that received Employment Support before the referral end date
M307 Number of referrals finishing in the month that received Employment Support before the referral end date and started not at caseness
M308 Number of referrals finishing in the month that received Employment Support before the referral end date and showed reliable improvement

M315 Reliable recovery rate for referrals finishing in the month that received Employment Support before the referral end date
M316 Number of referrals finishing a course of treatment in the month that received NHS Talking Therapies only before the referral end date and First Employment Status was Employed and In Work

M319 Number of referrals finishing a course of treatment in the month that received NHS Talking Therapies only before the referral end date and First Employment Status was Unknown

EA051 Number of referrals ending employment support in the month that have had both employment support and NHS Talking Therapies with a first recorded employment status of employed and off sick

EA277 Employment status for those starting employment support - off sick
EA278 Employment status for those starting employment support - not employed
EA279 Employment status for those starting employment support - unknown employment status
EA280 Count of follow-up employment support appointments which are recorded with an appointment type that aren't 10 - Employment support
EA281 Median wait in days from first assessment to first EA appointment for EA starting in month
EA282 Mean overall first WASAS score for referrals finishing in the month with at least some EA support before the referral enddate and at least two WASAS scores (across all dimensions).
EA283 Mean overall first WASAS score for referrals finishing in the month having NHS Talking Therapies only before the referral enddate and at least two WASAS scores (all dimensions).
